attributes.action: RACISM (one race inferior and another superior) IS DISCREDITED AND ABANDONED.
attributes.additional_details: Racism has being scientifically discredited, is responsible for hate crimes, unlawful discrimination and social inequality and injustice. We have different skin colour (shades of brown) due to varying amounts of the same pigment and comprise one human race. The terms black and white are racist terms based on scientific racism, where whites rule and blacks are deemed as primitive and subhuman. This is irrelevant and eradicated, alongside all racist ideology and cultural capital.
attributes.background:
Stop racist social classification, rhetoric, cultural capital, education and discourse. Replace Black with African. Replace White with European.
A separate Black curriculum is racist. Contributions to knowledge from Africans and ethnic groups are statutorily integrated into the National Curriculum.

rejection.details:
The UK Government is not responsible for the words people use. 

You could start a petition calling on the Government to conduct a review of all official Government public documents and online content to ensure the language used treats everyone equally, if that is something you'd like to happen.
